casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

March, 1947.

(March 5, 1947.) Bessie A. Hamilton, Respondent, v. William Walowsky, Appellant.

Judgment affirmed, with costs. All concur. (The judgment directs defendant to specifically perform a contract to sell his farm to plaintiff.) Present — Taylor, P. J., Dowling, Harris, MeCurn and Love, JJ.
